sn22.98:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.98:1.3: “atthi nu kho, bhante, kinci rupam, yam rupam niccam dhuvam sassatam aviparinamadhammam sassatisamam tatheva thassati?
sn22.98:1.4: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kaci vedana …pe…
sn22.98:1.7: kinci vinnanam, yam vinnanam niccam dhuvam sassatam aviparinamadhammam sassatisamam tatheva thassati”ti?
sn22.98:1.8: “Natthi kho, bhikkhu, kinci rupam yam rupam niccam dhuvam sassatam aviparinamadhammam sassatisamam tatheva thassati.
sn22.98:1.12: kinci vinnanam, yam vinnanam niccam dhuvam sassatam aviparinamadhammam sassatisamam tatheva thassati”ti.
